product_name: NYX Professional MakeupFat Oil Lip Drip Chillz Cooling Lip Oil
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackThe fan fav vegan lip oil, now with a lasting cooling effect! Get NYX Professional Makeup Fat Oil Chillz Lip Drip in cooling shades for high-shine lips without the stick!
details: DetailsFeaturesGet ready for a fat chill!Fat Oil in lip-cooling, jelly finish sheer shades.Same Fat shine. Same fat protection.12 hr hydration, comfortable wear, non-sticky texture, and high shine finish.Vegan Formula. Cruelty free.BenefitsInfused with cloudberry oil, raspberry oil and squalaneItem 2638407How To UseSwipe on lips with fat applicator, build-up fat oil up as desired.IngredientsPolyisobutene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Paraffinum Liquidum / Mineral Oil / Huile Minerale, Diisostearyl Malate, Menthone Glycerin Acetal, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Rubus Chamaemorus Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus Seed Oil / Raspberry Seed Oil, Squalane, Aroma / Flavor, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dibutyl Ethylhexanoyl Glutamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Sorbic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, CI 15850 / Red 7, CI 45410 / Red 28 Lake, CI 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake, CI 42090 / Blue 1 Lake, Benzyl Alcohol (F.I.L. N70051002/1).
how_to_use: Swipe on lips with fat applicator, build-up fat oil up as desired.
ingredients: Paraffinum Liquidum / Mineral Oil / Huile Minerale
Rubus Idaeus Seed Oil / Raspberry Seed Oil

reviews.headline: Okay lip oil, reminds me more of a lip gloss
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review Little stickier of a texture than expected for an oil. The green smells just like sour apple. Packaging is nice and love the applicator. Leaves a little tingle on the lips with a light shine.

reviews.headline: Leaves your lips feel soft soft and moisturized!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Hands down the best lip gloss moisturizer ever and you can tell it's working cause it feels medicated and it makes your lips feel soft soft and shiny, not to mention it smells so good and last long.

reviews.headline: Not really a lip "oil."
reviews.comments: I bought this after using Lip Smackers lip oil and loving the non-sticky texture. The more expensive one can only be better, right? Nope. The cooling effect is nice, but it's super sticky, more like a gloss and less like an oil. Think I'll go back to LS and leave this one for people who like sticky gloss.

reviews.headline: Cooling and ultra glossy!
reviews.comments: These have an immediate cooling effect and you can keep layering for an ultra glossy effect that will get lewks! These are better than Fenty and cheaper! They don't smell or taste weird like the Fenty cooling glosses and they last longer. Great for summer to wear alone or over another lip product. They don't have much color and mostly look clear, so no need to worry that you will have green or blue lips. Get them!

reviews.headline: LOOOOOOOVE
reviews.comments: this is definitely my new fav lip product. im onsessed with blue glosses and stumbled upon thisnone at ulta the other day and omg??? the smell??!!!? AMAZING. i had to fight off my 8 & 10 year old nieces from taking this from me cuz it smelled so good. ðŸ˜­ it feels amazing on the lips and the cooling effect is very pleasant and lasts for a long time :]

reviews.headline: My #1 lip gloss
reviews.comments: Love this so muchit is thick and last forever on your lips, i love the cooling feeling. I would definitely recomend this.

reviews.headline: Polar Peppermint is NOT Mint
reviews.comments: The cooling effect is nice but the peppermint flavor is not minty AT ALL, its more fruity, and its very sticky for a lip oil.

reviews.headline: Why is it grey?
reviews.comments: Why is my strawberry slush grey?  I had if shipped. I dont know if theyll let me return it. Gross

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Moisturizing! Like the cooling feeling! Love the applicator!

reviews.headline: Super chill lip oil
reviews.comments: Love this product, I got the green one. Feels great on my lips. A definitely must have

reviews.headline: Okay, WHAT
reviews.comments: I bought this using a gift card, and I was like why not? I came to my attention because I love the color blue, and nyx is such a good brand. When I got home I tried it, but found that the applicator didn't give me as much product as I wanted. I have large lips, but they aren't so big that usually need to double apply. Other than that, I had no idea what chillz lip oil was, and I thought it was a plumping one at first. After a little while the lip oil did start to feel really hydrating and had the 'chillz' effect. Not only that, but it lasts longer than the Elf one, and is smooth and thick at the same time. Yes!

reviews.headline: Great citrus smell
reviews.comments: The smell is great and not too strong. It doesn't attack your nostrils like others. The chill I thought would be a cool thing and plump but This doesn't plump your lips. The gloss is nice and not sticky like most gloss. My daughter loves to steal them out my purse.

reviews.headline: Very nice product
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] What stood out for me on this product was the texture. It is oily, but no greasy and sticky as other lip glosses. Leaves a plumping feeling in the lips and I also feel them hydrated. I apply it with other lipsticks and works very well. The packaging is fun and the brush has a good size, without taking so much product. Overall, it is a great product that became a staple on my makeup kit.

reviews.headline: Got kiwi but kinda smells like melon
reviews.comments: Really good, shiny and tingly. Applicator comes up kinda dry tho so have to keep dipping to apply a full lips worth

reviews.headline: THE BEST LIP OIL ON THE MARKET
reviews.comments: ITS SOOOOO GOOD! it is sk cooling almost like a pepermint on your lips! And lasts forever!

reviews.headline: Not special
reviews.comments: This is a meh product and the cooling affect is just a minty feel on the lips which in my opinon is not cooling. I was excited but these feel no different from the any other fat oil. The purple of I got was just clear. No need to buy this.

reviews.headline: Better than Fenty
reviews.comments: These are amazing and so high-shine! You can keep layering for a super gloss shine that will make heads turn. They are mainly clear and are non-sticky, easy to carry, and last a long time. I tried the Fenty gloss bomb ice cooling gloss and NYX is actuLly better and way cheaper.

reviews.headline: So in love but the applicator
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The applicator is not the best but I love the product.  The bottle shalt and the long lasting oil ate both great!!

reviews.headline: NYX Fat Oil
reviews.comments: Love this product! I'm an avid Chapstick user, but this is so much better. It's not sticky. Very hydrating and leaves a nice glossy finish! I will be purchasing more of these and throwing my Chapstick away!

reviews.headline: Absolutely love this!!
reviews.comments: I can feel the menthol soon as I put it on. I've been looking for a gloss/oil with this much mint. Love it so much. I already want to buy more.

faceoff_positive.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] NYX Cosmetics Fat Oil Chillz in Strawberry Slush: A Sweet, Hydrating Treat

I recently tried the NYX Cosmetics Fat Oil Chillz in Strawberry Slush, and I am absolutely loving it! This lip oil is a great combination of hydration and a glossy finish without being overly sticky. The formula feels lightweight yet nourishing, leaving my lips feeling soft and moisturized all day.

The Strawberry Slush scent is delightful â€” sweet, fruity, and refreshing, but not overpowering. It gives your lips a natural sheen, making them look plump and healthy. I also appreciate how the product gives a subtle, just-bitten tint that enhances my lips' natural color without being too bold.

What stands out the most is how it balances moisture and shine. Unlike some lip glosses that can feel heavy, this oil feels smooth and comfortable, even when layered throughout the day. It's perfect for those days when you want a pop of hydration and a light touch of color without committing to a full lipstick.

Overall, I'm highly impressed with NYX Fat Oil Chillz in Strawberry Slush. It's affordable, smells amazing, and keeps lips soft and smooth. Highly recommend if you're looking for a casual, easy-to-apply lip product with a sweet scent!
faceoff_positive.headline: Nonsticky and can be used over any lipstick!

faceoff_negative.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Not the biggest fan of this product. It was awesome they gave all four products to sample. However, I am very particular about consistency of lip products. This lip oil is very tacky and sticky. While pulling it out of the container it has a long string of gloss but I couldn't get it on photo. Good things about this product is that they all have a great scent that matches the description. Also leaves a pretty glossy/ shine to your lips. Also helps with chapped lips.
faceoff_negative.headline: Smells good but to sticky for my liking
